profileAlternative.name: Ramya Iyer
profileAlternative.headline: Software Engineering Graduate Student at San Jose State University
profileAlternative.summary:
I am a passionate and persistent software engineer always seeking for ways to furnish efficient deliverables and making myself better at every step of the process.

I am an experienced Big Data Developer with about two and a half years of experience in the industry where I built dynamic solutions to increase the efficiency of the system and developed extremely reliable workflows to mine crucial reports from large data sets.

My skills can be summarized as follows:
• Programming Languages: Java, Python, C, C++, Shell Scripting
• Web Development: REST, JavaScript, NodeJS, ExpressJS, ReactJS, Redis, Redux, GraphQL, Apollo Client,HTML, CSS, PHP
• Database: MySQL, Microsoft SQL Server, Oracle DB, MongoDB
• Version Control : Git, Tortoise SVN
• DevOps and Cloud Technology: Docker, Kubernetes, Amazon Web Services
• Big Data Toolkit: Hadoop, MapReduce, Impala, Hive, Sqoop, Oozie, Kafka
• Key Technologies: Big Data Analytics, Full Stack Web Development
